csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en-US">

    <macro name="title">
       <text variable="title" quotes="true" suffix=","/>
    </macro>

    <citation>
        <layout>
            <text value="Ignore me"/>
        </layout>
    </citation>

    <bibliography>
        <layout>
            <text macro="title"/>
        </layout>        
    </bibliography>

</style>
